issue.title: Robots launching off platform in newest docker images?

content.raw:
I’m launching with ./run\_docker\_compose.sh. My docker-compose.yml is based on yours, with my solution images dropped in in place of osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt\_solution\_latest

Apparently I was not using the circuit environment variable correctly - had set it to urban\_circuit, not urban.
content.html:
I’m launching with ./run_docker_compose.sh. My docker-compose.yml is based on yours, with my solution images dropped in in place of osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:subt_solution_latest

Apparently I was not using the circuit environment variable correctly - had set it to urban_circuit, not urban.
